day11mission2: Achieve 20 kills with a throwing weapon
day14mission1: Play 5 matches in PC (Protect the Commander)
header_desc: Merry Christmas from Team BlackShot! The holidays have come again, and the BlackShot Mercenaries are ready to celebrate. Join together with your friends and enjoy all of the holiday themed additions to the game, including the new Station map and an Advent Calendar filled with festive prizes, plus a massive collection of limited-time holiday items in the shop to help you get into the spirit of the season.
s1_desc: Through Dec. 26, celebrate the Christmas season and claim special winters items from the Hot Time Advent Calendar! Every day you log in through the event period, you will find a new special festive item in your Mailbox - log in every day during the event to get the most rewards!
s2_desc: It’s beginning to look a lot like Christmas – the BlackShot way! Keep an eye out for these festive additions to the game, including explosive presents, tree flags, and Lost Temple, Christmas Edition.
s3_desc: Hide away from the winter cold underground on the new Station map! Hold on to your ticket and keep off the tracks on this winding wide open battleground.
s4_desc: Santa came early this year, and delivered gifts for all the good little Mercenary boys and girls into the latest Goldbox. Whether you’ve been good, bad, or a bit of both, this Goldbox has something for everyone. Check out all of the new additions, including the Sniper X-MAS and AWP Candy, available only during the holiday season!
s5_desc: Check out these exclusive holiday items, available in the shop for a very limited time!
s6_desc: Get the most out of the Christmas season with these festive map boosts. The weather may be getting colder, but these maps are heating up with 200% EXP! Enjoy these boosts only during the holiday season.
s7_desc: Ho ho ho! Even the GM Monsters have gotten in on the holiday spirit, and have dressed up like Santa once again to punish all the naughty Mercenaries on the battlefield. Win these holiday GM matches for special prizes, and take the terrifying false Santas down for additional rewards.
common_dec_friday:
Every Friday in December
From December 15th to December 29th
20:00 (CET)
